title: Shipment: Onboard to SeCeIT Shipment Tracking API
description:
Description
POT shall onboard to the SeCeIT shipment tracking API. The newly to be created SeCeIT shipment tracking API plans to have the same API definition as it already exists for the shipment tracking service for CRM-T orders. The shipment information provided by the service shall be mapped to SeCeIT orders in the same way as already done for CRM-T orders.
acceptance_criteria: POT onboards to the newly created SeCeIT shipment tracking API
